ValidationRule.description: Req 636: Unweighted Amount shoudnt be changed after "Develop Opportunity" Sales Phase.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( OR(ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Create Offer (Bid)"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Win the Case (Negotiate)"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Handover (Prepare for Delivery)") ), ISCHANGED( Amount ), Is_Automated__c=false,
($Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Unweighted Amount cannot be changed after "Develop Opportunity" Sales Phase.
